column5: This house is 1 minute away from freeway 69, 3 minutes away from Chinatown, and 20 minutes away from the Medical Center. We have plenty of parking available at this house! There are tons of great restaurants nearby in Chinatown and also a few great taco shops.   **We are redoing the floors very soon so I will upload new photos that will reflect new wood flooring**  We love long term guests!
column8: Bright Private Room Near Chinatown and 69 Fwy
